nodes.description: 1983年4月，策划并实施美国驻贝鲁特大使馆汽车炸弹袭击，造成63人死亡，包括17名美国人
nodes.support_text: He is accused of masterminding the first major suicide bombing to target Americans: the April 1983 car bombing of the U.S. Embassy in Beirut that killed 63 people, including 17 Americans.

nodes.description: 1983年10月，策划并实施法国和美国驻贝鲁特军营卡车炸弹袭击，导致59名法国士兵和241名美国海军陆战队士兵死亡
nodes.support_text: six months later, when suicide attackers detonated truck bombs at the barracks of French and U.S. peacekeeping forces in Beirut, killing 59 French paratroopers and 241 American Marines.

nodes.description: 1985年，策划并实施TWA 847航班劫机事件，导致海军潜水员Robert Stethem被杀害
nodes.support_text: The hijacking produced one of the most iconic images of pre-9/11 terrorism, a photo of the jet’s pilot leaning out the cockpit window with a gunman waving a pistol in front of his face.

nodes.description: 1992年，策划并实施以色列驻布宜诺斯艾利斯大使馆爆炸，造成29人死亡
nodes.support_text: Israel accused Mughniyeh of involvement in the 1992 bombing of its embassy in Buenos Aires in which 29 people were killed.

nodes.description: 1992年，Hezbollah前领导人Sheik Abbas Mussawi在黎巴嫩遭直升机袭击身亡
nodes.support_text: the first major attack against a Hezbollah leader since a 1992 helicopter strike that killed the group’s secretary-general Sheik Abbas Mussawi.

nodes.description: 1994年，策划并实施布宜诺斯艾利斯犹太中心爆炸，造成85人死亡
nodes.support_text: Alberto Nisman also accused Mughniyeh in the 1994 bombing of a Buenos Aires Jewish center that killed 85 people.

nodes.description: 1996年，策划并实施沙特Khobar Towers爆炸，导致19名美国人死亡
nodes.support_text: Western intelligence also links him to Khobar Towers bombing, the Western official said.

nodes.description: 1994年，Mughniyeh的兄弟Fuad在贝鲁特遭汽车炸弹袭击身亡
nodes.support_text: Mughniyeh’s last public appearance was thought to be at the funeral of his brother Fuad, who was killed in 1994 by a booby-trapped car in Beirut.

nodes.description: 2006年，Mughniyeh与伊朗总统Ahmadinejad在叙利亚会面
nodes.support_text: Mughniyeh was reported to have met with hard-line Iranian President Mahmoud Ahmadinejad in Syria.

nodes.description: 2008年2月13日，Mughniyeh在叙利亚大马士革遭汽车炸弹袭击身亡
nodes.support_text: One of the world’s most wanted and elusive terrorists, Imad Mughniyeh, was killed by a car bomb in Syria nearly 15 years after dropping almost entirely from sight.

edges.support_text: six months later
The one-time Hezbollah security chief was implicated in attacks that killed hundreds of Americans in Lebanon in the 1980s
六个月后

Western intelligence agencies think he took his terror attacks abroad, hitting Jewish and Israeli interests in Argentina, and he has been linked to the 1996 bombing of the Khobar Towers in Saudi Arabia
Prosecutors said Iranian officials orchestrated the attack and entrusted Hezbollah to carry it out.
Western intelligence also links him to Khobar Towers bombing
Mughniyeh’s last public appearance was thought to be at the funeral of his brother Fuad, who was killed in 1994
Mughniyeh was reported to have met with hard-line Iranian President Mahmoud Ahmadinejad in Syria.
